attributes.review: I downloaded this app cause i thought it would make all my problems go away😻As soon as i got it i felt kinda funny😹😹i went to the mirror and saw that i my skin was orange😋 I couldnt believe it!!😏😏i started crying cause I didnt want to look like our Cheeto lookin ass president💔 i ran outside and i began to sink into the earth🏃🏻✨once i reached the center i saw a gross lumpy rock,,i turned around and it was donald😳🤢🤢 i grabbed my shoe and threw it at him,,but it bounced off the orange force field around him😱 suddenly he started crying like a baby🤩 he screamed that he was gonna ban tik tok cause we were a cult🧚🏼‍♂️✨i threw my other shoe and this time it hit him on the head😎💞he said he was gonna ban all the minorites and make them dispappear🕺🏻💨and then he said all the homophobes would rule america🤰🏻💦but then i said no and suddenly he disappeared👀i went back to the surface and Donald was nowhere to be seen🥴but then i woke up and realized it was a dream😪😪that is why this app is trash🙅🏻‍♂️💖dont download it😔✨
Don’t get this app it’s slow

attributes.review: This app is absolute garbage, and so is are president but besides the point i don’t ever want to use this again. It doesn’t help with anything and it is completely useless, this app will waste time for other people and as I said it’s garbage.
attributes.title: Dump trump

attributes.review:
Amazing app! Just the naked president appearing on my screen has deeply traumatized me and my dog. The features are great other than the fact that my background was also changed to explicitly revolting images... I don’t intend to upset the people reading the reviews because it is a good app but like, be sure to be prepared with what you see.

Sincerely, 
          Nicholas Chauvini
attributes.title: Amazing app!

attributes.review: I downloaded this app cause it seemed like it was legitimate. DO NOT BE FOOLED. This is a FAKE APP. They ask for your phone number despite being on your phone already. DO NOT PUT YOUR NUMBER IN. The “people” who created this app just want your information. The picture on the app when it asks for your number shows you a picture of the latest fascist leader to plague America. DO NOT LOOK AT PICTURE it will rot your insides faster than COVID-19 can and make sleep impossible.  Don’t fall for their Russian sleep experiment.
